committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across certain federal lands in the State of Arkansas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across the Buffalo National River, Arkansas, to specified privately owned lands along a route known as the Old Springtown Road. Requires individuals owning such lands to pay an annual fee to the Secretary sufficient to cover costs of permitting such access.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across certain federal lands in the State of Arkansas, and for other purposes.
